title: Bottle

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a bottle, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a top and side perspective view of a bottle showing my new design;
FIGS. 2–4 are side elevational views thereof, on a reduced scale, the side elevational views of all four sides of the bottle being identical; and,
FIG. 5 is a top plan view thereof.
The appearance of the bottom of the bottle forms no part of the present design and is not claimed.
